params.disputeWindow: The dispute window duration in seconds
params.taskRefCid: IPFS CID reference for task details

returns.active: True if dispute window is still active

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.operatorWins: True if operator wins the dispute

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

acceptTask(uint256).notice: Accept a funded task (operator posts bond if required)

cancelUnaccepted(uint256).notice: Cancel an unaccepted task after deadline

isDisputeWindowActive(uint256).notice: Check if dispute window is still active for a submitted task

release(uint256).notice: Release payment to operator (requester accepts the proof)
